title: Slow cooker beef and barley soup
ingredients: ['2 beef soup bones', '2 tablespoons salt', '5 stalks celery, halved', '1 onion, quartered', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 bouquet garni', '6 carrots, halved', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '11 cloves garlic, peeled', '175g (6 oz) pearl barley']
